contents:
Lincoln Center’s White Light Festival is a fall music festival that focuses on the ability of music to illuminate the many different characteristics and dimensions of our interior lives. Since 2010, the festival explores music across cultural traditions. This year’s lineup includes Babel(words)—a modern retelling of the biblical story of Babel—and Verdi’s Requiem by the London Symphony Orchestra.   

 

For more information, visit the official White Light Festival website.
